title: Leaver Buster
body:
I've gotten a leaver buster because i left the match but i left the match because i had problems trying to reconnect i checked my internet is was perfectly fine so then when i finally reconnected to the match it finished and then it gave me leaver but i didn't
deserve the leaver because the server gave me issues on trying to reconnect and if i did leave the game because i had to go i would be fine with it but getting leaver because the server gave me issues on trying to reconnect? I'm not fine with it.
